org.anyframe.xp.query.service.impl
Class XPDao

java.lang.Object
  org.anyframe.xp.query.service.impl.XPDao

public class XPDao
extends Object

This class provides methods to send pre-defined queries to Database.

Author:
Youngmin Jo
